00042 class Semaphore : private NonCopyable {
00043 public:
00044   Semaphore(int resource_count = 0);
00045 
00046   ~Semaphore();
00047 
00050   inline void acquire() {
00051     sem_wait(semaphore_);
00052   }
00053 
00056   inline void release() {
00057     sem_post(semaphore_);
00058   }
00059 
00062   inline void acquire(size_t count) {
00063     assert(count <= resource_count_);
00064     ScopedSLock lock(acquire_mutex_);
00065     for (size_t i=0; i < count; ++i) {
00066       acquire();
00067     }
00068   }
00069 
00072   inline void release(size_t count) {
00073     assert(count <= resource_count_);
00074     for (size_t i=0; i < count; ++i) {
00075       release();
00076     }
00077   }
00078 
00081   inline void acquire_all() {
00082     acquire(resource_count_);
00083   }
00084 
00087   inline void release_all() {
00088     release(resource_count_);
00089   }
00090 
00091  private:
00092   size_t resource_count_;
00093   Mutex acquire_mutex_;
00094   sem_t *semaphore_;
00095 };
